title: Omar Ayub prays for speedy recovery of PM from COVID-19
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 20 (APP): Minister for Power Division Omar Ayub Khan on Saturday
prayed Allah Almighty to grant perfect health to Prime Minister Imran Khan who has been
tested positive for COVID-19.
In his tweet, the minister said, “ the whole nation prays for Imran Khan’s complete
recovery. Insha Allah the Prime Minister will recover soon and continue to serve the
